clinical_study.official_title: Voice-based Identification of Clinical Features Requiring Emergent Action in Patients With Suspected COVID-19 Infection (VOICE-COVID) Study

lead_sponsor.agency: McGill University Health Centre/Research Institute of the McGill University Health Centre

clinical_study.source: McGill University Health Centre/Research Institute of the McGill University Health Centre

brief_summary.textblock: The VOICE-COVID study will evaluate the concordance of screening for symptoms of COVID-19 using a voice based device (Amazon Alexa) compared to manual screening by a study coordinator for individuals entering the Cardiology/Heart Failure clinic at the McGill University Health Centre.

detailed_description.textblock:
This study is an open-label, non-interventional, prospective study.
All individuals entering the Heart Failure (HF) Clinic of the McGill University Health Center will be asked to participate. A poster with instructions to ask the participants (employees or patients) to speak with the Amazon Alexa device. The participant will remain 6 feet away from the device. The Amazon Alexa will ask the survey questions. A study coordinator will then ask the same questions along with some additional questions about Amazon Alexa usability. We will study the correlation between the Alexa response and the response to the study coordinator using K-squared statistic tests.

primary_outcome.measure: Correlation between data captured using Amazon Alexa compared to manual (human) collected data.
primary_outcome.description: Determine the ability of the Amazon Alexa device to properly capture answers from participants and correlate with the answers retrieved by the study coordinator, we will use a linear regression approach to model the relationship between both surveys

intervention.description: To test the use of the Amazon Alexa device as a tool to conduct screening of employees and patients at the point of entry into the Heart Failure (HF) Clinic of the McGill University Health Center.

study_pop.textblock: Any employees or patients entering the Heart Failure clinic at the McGill University Health Center

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults >=18 yrs who is entering the HF clinic
- Speaks either English or French
Exclusion Criteria:
- None
